channel.title: Priv servers and clients in linux
channel.description:
im guessing after u install java since there is no one location for it in linux u would have to put in a .sh file
[code] '/mnt/hda1/root/Desktop/java/java.exe' '/mnt/hda1/root/Desktop/server/client [or client.class??]
[/code]
any1 got ne ideas?
